name: Tower of wind and water
description:
It's raining again! Get to the top of the tower to stop the rain before something catastrophic happens! short and classic platforming game with only 3 levels.

game made in 48 hours for a challenge.

Controls: WASD  ==>  MOVE Z==>  JUMP (hold to jump higher) X  ==>  SWING SWORD (to break boxes) C  ==>  SHOOT BUBBLE (to push objects / activate switches)
